meanings.definition: The quality of providing useful or valuable information.
meanings.sent1: The informativeness of the article helped me understand the topic better.
meanings.sent2: The informativeness of the report made it easier to make a decision.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a dictionary could have such informativeness until I read this one!
meanings.sent4: Her speech had an informativeness that was like a light in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The informativeness of the map was so clear that even a child could follow it.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is informative.
meanings.sent1: The informativeness of the presentation was impressive and kept everyone engaged.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the informativeness of the training manual; it covers everything I need to know.
meanings.sent3: The informativeness of the weather forecast made me laugh because it was so accurate!
meanings.sent4: The informativeness of her gaze revealed more than words ever could.
meanings.sent5: The informativeness of the documentary left a lasting impact on the audience.
